piloting.name: Piloting
piloting.desc: Use higher-tech ships. Those typically have more room.

fields.name: Fields
fields.desc: Use of cloaks and auras. Not used much yet.

command.name: Command
command.desc: Have more and higher-tech combat and non-combat ships in your fleet. Having too low command has VERY heavy penalties, so you shouldn't exceed your command limit for long.
